3789.verse-arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالصَّافَّاتِ صَفًّا
3789.verse-english: By those [angels] lined up in rows

clauses-arabic.clause: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالصَّافَّاتِ صَفًّا

clauses-english.clause: By those [angels] lined up in rows

3791.verse-english: And those who recite the message,

clauses-english.clause: And those who recite the message,

3793.verse-arabic: رَّبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ الْمَشَارِقِ
3793.verse-english: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them and Lord of the sunrises.

clauses-arabic.clause: رَّبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ الْمَشَارِقِ

clauses-english.clause: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them and Lord of the sunrises.

3794.verse-arabic: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا السَّمَاءَ الدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ الْكَوَاكِبِ
3794.verse-english: Indeed, We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment of stars

clauses-english.clause: We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment of stars

3795.verse-english: And as protection against every rebellious devil

clauses-english.clause: And as protection against every rebellious devil

3796.verse-arabic: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى الْمَلَإِ الْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٍ
3796.verse-english: [So] they may not listen to the exalted assembly [of angels] and are pelted from every side,

clauses-arabic.clause: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى الْمَلَإِ الْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٍ

clauses-english.clause: [So] they may not listen to the exalted assembly [of angels] and are pelted from every side,

3797.verse-english: Repelled; and for them is a constant punishment,

clauses-english.clause: and for them is a constant punishment,

3798.verse-arabic: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ الْخَطْفَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُ شِهَابٌ ثَاقِبٌ
3798.verse-english: Except one who snatches [some words] by theft, but they are pursued by a burning flame, piercing [in brightness].

clauses-english.clause: Except one who snatches [some words] by theft,
but they are pursued by a burning flame,

3799.verse-arabic: فَاسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَم مَّنْ خَلَقْنَا ۚ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُم مِّن طِينٍ لَّازِبٍ
3799.verse-english: Then inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Are they a stronger [or more difficult] creation or those [others] We have created?" Indeed, We created men from sticky clay.

clauses-english.clause: "Are they a stronger [or more difficult] creation or those [others] We have created?
We created men from sticky clay.

3800.verse-english: But you wonder, while they mock,

3801.verse-english: And when they are reminded, they remember not.

3802.verse-english: And when they see a sign, they ridicule

clauses-english.clause: And when they see a sign,

3803.verse-arabic: وَقَالُوا إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
3803.verse-english: And say, "This is not but obvious magic.

3804.verse-arabic: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
3804.verse-english: When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?

clauses-english.clause: When we have died and become dust and bones,
are we indeed to be resurrected?

3806.verse-english: Say, "Yes, and you will be [rendered] contemptible."

3807.verse-arabic: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ فَإِذَا هُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
3807.verse-english: It will be only one shout, and at once they will be observing.

clauses-english.clause: It will be only one shout,
and at once they will be observing.

3808.verse-arabic: وَقَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا هَٰذَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
3808.verse-english: They will say, "O woe to us! This is the Day of Recompense."

clauses-english.clause: This is the Day of Recompense.

3809.verse-arabic: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
3809.verse-english: [They will be told], "This is the Day of Judgement which you used to deny."

clauses-english.clause: "This is the Day of Judgement which you used to deny.

3810.verse-arabic: ۞ احْشُرُوا الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا وَأَزْوَاجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا يَعْبُدُونَ
3810.verse-english: [The angels will be ordered], "Gather those who committed wrong, their kinds, and what they used to worship

clauses-english.clause: and what they used to worship

3811.verse-arabic: مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ فَاهْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَاطِ الْجَحِيمِ
3811.verse-english: Other than Allah, and guide them to the path of Hellfire

clauses-english.clause: and guide them to the path of Hellfire

3812.verse-english: And stop them; indeed, they are to be questioned."

3813.verse-english: [They will be asked], "What is [wrong] with you? Why do you not help each other?"

clauses-english.clause: Why do you not help each other?

3814.verse-english: But they, that Day, are in surrender.

3815.verse-english: And they will approach one another blaming each other.

clauses-english.clause: And they will approach one another blaming each other.

3816.verse-arabic: قَالُوا إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ الْيَمِينِ
3816.verse-english: They will say, "Indeed, you used to come at us from the right."

clauses-english.clause: you used to come at us from the right.

3817.verse-english: The oppressors will say, "Rather, you [yourselves] were not believers,

3818.verse-arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُم مِّن سُلْطَانٍ ۖ بَلْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًا طَاغِينَ
3818.verse-english: And we had over you no authority, but you were a transgressing people.

clauses-english.clause: And we had over you no authority,
but you were a transgressing people.

3819.verse-arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَا ۖ إِنَّا لَذَائِقُونَ
3819.verse-english: So the word of our Lord has come into effect upon us; indeed, we will taste [punishment].

clauses-english.clause: So the word of our Lord has come into effect upon us;

3820.verse-english: And we led you to deviation; indeed, we were deviators."

clauses-english.clause: And we led you to deviation;

3821.verse-english: So indeed they, that Day, will be sharing in the punishment.

clauses-english.clause: will be sharing in the punishment.

3822.verse-english: Indeed, that is how We deal with the criminals.

clauses-english.clause: that is how We deal with the criminals.

3823.verse-arabic: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
3823.verse-english: Indeed they, when it was said to them, "There is no deity but Allah," were arrogant

clauses-english.clause: when it was said to them,

3824.verse-arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُو آلِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٍ مَّجْنُونٍ
3824.verse-english: And were saying, "Are we to leave our gods for a mad poet?"

clauses-english.clause: "Are we to leave our gods for a mad poet?

3825.verse-english: Rather, the Prophet has come with the truth and confirmed the [previous] messengers.

clauses-english.clause: the Prophet has come with the truth and confirmed the [previous] messengers.

3826.verse-english: Indeed, you [disbelievers] will be tasters of the painful punishment,

clauses-english.clause: you [disbelievers] will be tasters of the painful punishment,

3827.verse-arabic: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
3827.verse-english: And you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do -

clauses-arabic.clause: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

clauses-english.clause: And you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do -

3828.verse-english: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

clauses-english.clause: But not the chosen servants of God.

3829.verse-english: Those will have a provision determined -

clauses-english.clause: Those will have a provision determined -

3830.verse-english: Fruits; and they will be honored

3833.verse-english: There will be circulated among them a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring,

clauses-english.clause: There will be circulated among them a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring,

3834.verse-english: White and delicious to the drinkers;

clauses-english.clause: White and delicious to the drinkers;

3835.verse-arabic: لَا فِيهَا غَوْلٌ وَلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنزَفُونَ
3835.verse-english: No bad effect is there in it, nor from it will they be intoxicated.

clauses-english.clause: No bad effect is there in it,
nor from it will they be intoxicated.

3836.verse-english: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances, with large, [beautiful] eyes,

clauses-english.clause: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances,

3837.verse-english: As if they were [delicate] eggs, well-protected.

3838.verse-english: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.

clauses-english.clause: And they will approach one another,

3839.verse-arabic: قَالَ قَائِلٌ مِّنْهُمْ إِنِّي كَانَ لِي قَرِينٌ
3839.verse-english: A speaker among them will say, "Indeed, I had a companion [on earth]

clauses-english.clause: A speaker among them will say,

3840.verse-english: Who would say, 'Are you indeed of those who believe

clauses-english.clause: 'Are you indeed of those who believe

3841.verse-arabic: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ
3841.verse-english: That when we have died and become dust and bones, we will indeed be recompensed?'"

clauses-english.clause: That when we have died and become dust and bones,

3842.verse-english: He will say, "Would you [care to] look?"

3843.verse-english: And he will look and see him in the midst of the Hellfire.

clauses-english.clause: And he will look and see him in the midst of the Hellfire.

3844.verse-english: He will say, "By Allah, you almost ruined me.

3845.verse-arabic: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّي لَكُنتُ مِنَ الْمُحْضَرِينَ
3845.verse-english: If not for the favor of my Lord, I would have been of those brought in [to Hell].

clauses-english.clause: If not for the favor of my Lord,
I would have been of those brought in [to Hell].

3846.verse-english: Then, are we not to die

3847.verse-arabic: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا الْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
3847.verse-english: Except for our first death, and we will not be punished?"

clauses-english.clause: and we will not be punished?

3848.verse-english: Indeed, this is the great attainment.

3849.verse-english: For the like of this let the workers [on earth] work.

clauses-english.clause: For the like of this let the workers [on earth] work.

3850.verse-arabic: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ نُّزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ الزَّقُّومِ
3850.verse-english: Is Paradise a better accommodation or the tree of zaqqum?

clauses-arabic.clause: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ نُّزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ الزَّقُّومِ

clauses-english.clause: Is Paradise a better accommodation or the tree of zaqqum?

3851.verse-english: Indeed, We have made it a torment for the wrongdoers.

clauses-english.clause: We have made it a torment for the wrongdoers.

3852.verse-arabic: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌ تَخْرُجُ فِي أَصْلِ الْجَحِيمِ
3852.verse-english: Indeed, it is a tree issuing from the bottom of the Hellfire,

clauses-english.clause: it is a tree issuing from the bottom of the Hellfire,

3853.verse-english: Its emerging fruit as if it was heads of the devils.

clauses-english.clause: Its emerging fruit as if it was heads of the devils.

3854.verse-arabic: فَإِنَّهُمْ لَآكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِئُونَ مِنْهَا الْبُطُونَ
3854.verse-english: And indeed, they will eat from it and fill with it their bellies.

clauses-english.clause: they will eat from it and fill with it their bellies.

3855.verse-arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًا مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ
3855.verse-english: Then indeed, they will have after it a mixture of scalding water.

clauses-english.clause: they will have after it a mixture of scalding water.

3856.verse-english: Then indeed, their return will be to the Hellfire.

clauses-english.clause: their return will be to the Hellfire.

3857.verse-english: Indeed they found their fathers astray.

clauses-english.clause: Indeed they found their fathers astray.

3858.verse-english: So they hastened [to follow] in their footsteps.

clauses-english.clause: So they hastened [to follow] in their footsteps.

3859.verse-english: And there had already strayed before them most of the former peoples,

clauses-english.clause: And there had already strayed before them most of the former peoples,

3860.verse-english: And We had already sent among them warners.

clauses-english.clause: And We had already sent among them warners.

3861.verse-english: Then look how was the end of those who were warned -

clauses-english.clause: Then look how was the end of those who were warned -

3862.verse-english: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

clauses-english.clause: But not the chosen servants of God.

3863.verse-english: And Noah had certainly called Us, and [We are] the best of responders.

clauses-english.clause: And Noah had certainly called Us,
and [We are] the best of responders.

3864.verse-english: And We saved him and his family from the great affliction.

clauses-english.clause: And We saved him and his family from the great affliction.

3865.verse-english: And We made his descendants those remaining [on the earth]

clauses-english.clause: And We made his descendants those remaining [on the earth]

3866.verse-english: And left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

clauses-english.clause: And left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

3868.verse-english: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

clauses-english.clause: We thus reward the doers of good.

3869.verse-english: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

clauses-english.clause: he was of Our believing servants.

3871.verse-english: And indeed, among his kind was Abraham,

3872.verse-english: When he came to his Lord with a sound heart

clauses-english.clause: When he came to his Lord with a sound heart

3873.verse-arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ
3873.verse-english: [And] when he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?

clauses-english.clause: [And] when he said to his father and his people,

3874.verse-english: Is it falsehood [as] gods other than Allah you desire?

clauses-english.clause: Is it falsehood [as] gods other than God you desire?

3875.verse-english: Then what is your thought about the Lord of the worlds?"

clauses-english.clause: Then what is your thought about the Lord of the worlds?

3876.verse-english: And he cast a look at the stars

clauses-english.clause: And he cast a look at the stars

3877.verse-english: And said, "Indeed, I am [about to be] ill."

3878.verse-english: So they turned away from him, departing.

clauses-english.clause: So they turned away from him,

3879.verse-arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰ آلِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
3879.verse-english: Then he turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat?

clauses-english.clause: Then he turned to their gods and said,

3880.verse-english: What is [wrong] with you that you do not speak?"

clauses-english.clause: What is [wrong] with you that you do not speak?

3881.verse-english: And he turned upon them a blow with [his] right hand.

clauses-english.clause: And he turned upon them a blow with [his] right hand.

3882.verse-english: Then the people came toward him, hastening.

clauses-english.clause: Then the people came toward him,

3883.verse-english: He said, "Do you worship that which you [yourselves] carve,

clauses-english.clause: "Do you worship that which you [yourselves] carve,

3884.verse-english: While Allah created you and that which you do?"

clauses-english.clause: While God created you and that which you do?

3885.verse-arabic: قَالُوا ابْنُوا لَهُ بُنْيَانًا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِي الْجَحِيمِ
3885.verse-english: They said, "Construct for him a furnace and throw him into the burning fire."

clauses-english.clause: "Construct for him a furnace and throw him into the burning fire.

3886.verse-english: And they intended for him a plan, but We made them the most debased.

clauses-english.clause: And they intended for him a plan,
but We made them the most debased.

3887.verse-arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهْدِينِ
3887.verse-english: And [then] he said, "Indeed, I will go to [where I am ordered by] my Lord; He will guide me.

clauses-english.clause: I will go to [where I am ordered by] my Lord;

3888.verse-english: My Lord, grant me [a child] from among the righteous."

clauses-english.clause: grant me [a child] from among the righteous.

3889.verse-english: So We gave him good tidings of a forbearing boy.

clauses-english.clause: So We gave him good tidings of a forbearing boy.

3890.verse-arabic: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ السَّعْيَ قَالَ يَا بُنَيَّ إِنِّي أَرَىٰ فِي الْمَنَامِ أَنِّي أَذْبَحُكَ فَانظُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ ۚ قَالَ يَا أَبَتِ افْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ ۖ سَتَجِدُنِي إِن شَاءَ اللَّهُ مِنَ الصَّابِرِينَ
3890.verse-english: And when he reached with him [the age of] exertion, he said, "O my son, indeed I have seen in a dream that I [must] sacrifice you, so see what you think." He said, "O my father, do as you are commanded. You will find me, if Allah wills, of the steadfast."

clauses-english.clause: And when he reached with him [the age of] exertion,
indeed I have seen in a dream that I [must] sacrifice you,

3891.verse-english: And when they had both submitted and he put him down upon his forehead,

clauses-english.clause: And when they had both submitted and he put him down upon his forehead,

3893.verse-arabic: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ الرُّؤْيَا ۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
3893.verse-english: You have fulfilled the vision." Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

clauses-english.clause: We thus reward the doers of good.

3894.verse-english: Indeed, this was the clear trial.

3895.verse-english: And We ransomed him with a great sacrifice,

clauses-english.clause: And We ransomed him with a great sacrifice,

3896.verse-english: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

clauses-english.clause: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

3898.verse-english: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

clauses-english.clause: We thus reward the doers of good.

3899.verse-english: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

clauses-english.clause: he was of Our believing servants.

3900.verse-english: And We gave him good tidings of Isaac, a prophet from among the righteous.

clauses-english.clause: And We gave him good tidings of Isaac,
a prophet from among the righteous.

3901.verse-arabic: وَبَارَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰ إِسْحَاقَ ۚ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحْسِنٌ وَظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِ مُبِينٌ
3901.verse-english: And We blessed him and Isaac. But among their descendants is the doer of good and the clearly unjust to himself.

clauses-english.clause: And We blessed him and Isaac.
But among their descendants is the doer of good and the clearly unjust to himself.

3902.verse-english: And We did certainly confer favor upon Moses and Aaron.

clauses-english.clause: And We did certainly confer favor upon Moses and Aaron.

3903.verse-english: And We saved them and their people from the great affliction,

clauses-english.clause: And We saved them and their people from the great affliction,

3904.verse-english: And We supported them so it was they who overcame.

clauses-english.clause: And We supported them so it was they who overcame.

3905.verse-english: And We gave them the explicit Scripture,

clauses-english.clause: And We gave them the explicit Scripture,

3906.verse-english: And We guided them on the straight path.

clauses-english.clause: And We guided them on the straight path.

3907.verse-english: And We left for them [favorable mention] among later generations:

clauses-english.clause: And We left for them [favorable mention] among later generations:

3909.verse-english: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

clauses-english.clause: We thus reward the doers of good.

3910.verse-english: Indeed, they were of Our believing servants.

clauses-english.clause: they were of Our believing servants.

3911.verse-english: And indeed, Elias was from among the messengers,

clauses-english.clause: Elias was from among the messengers,

3912.verse-english: When he said to his people, "Will you not fear Allah?

clauses-english.clause: When he said to his people,

3913.verse-english: Do you call upon Ba'l and leave the best of creators -

clauses-english.clause: Do you call upon Ba'l and leave the best of creators -

3914.verse-english: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers?"

clauses-english.clause: your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers?

3915.verse-english: And they denied him, so indeed, they will be brought [for punishment],

3916.verse-english: Except the chosen servants of Allah.

clauses-english.clause: Except the chosen servants of God.

3917.verse-english: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

clauses-english.clause: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

3919.verse-english: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

clauses-english.clause: We thus reward the doers of good.

3920.verse-english: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

clauses-english.clause: he was of Our believing servants.

3921.verse-english: And indeed, Lot was among the messengers.

3922.verse-english: [So mention] when We saved him and his family, all,

clauses-english.clause: [So mention] when We saved him and his family,

3923.verse-english: Except his wife among those who remained [with the evildoers].

clauses-english.clause: Except his wife among those who remained [with the evildoers].

3925.verse-english: And indeed, you pass by them in the morning

clauses-english.clause: you pass by them in the morning

3926.verse-english: And at night. Then will you not use reason?

clauses-english.clause: Then will you not use reason?

3927.verse-english: And indeed, Jonah was among the messengers.

3928.verse-english: [Mention] when he ran away to the laden ship.

clauses-english.clause: [Mention] when he ran away to the laden ship.

3929.verse-english: And he drew lots and was among the losers.

clauses-english.clause: And he drew lots and was among the losers.

3930.verse-english: Then the fish swallowed him, while he was blameworthy.

3931.verse-english: And had he not been of those who exalt Allah,

clauses-english.clause: And had he not been of those who exalt God,

3932.verse-arabic: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطْنِهِ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
3932.verse-english: He would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected.

clauses-arabic.clause: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطْنِهِ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ

clauses-english.clause: He would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected.

3933.verse-english: But We threw him onto the open shore while he was ill.

clauses-english.clause: But We threw him onto the open shore while he was ill.

3934.verse-english: And We caused to grow over him a gourd vine.

clauses-english.clause: And We caused to grow over him a gourd vine.

3935.verse-arabic: وَأَرْسَلْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ مِائَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ
3935.verse-english: And We sent him to [his people of] a hundred thousand or more.

clauses-arabic.clause: وَأَرْسَلْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ مِائَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ

clauses-english.clause: And We sent him to [his people of] a hundred thousand or more.

3936.verse-english: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment [of life] for a time.

clauses-english.clause: so We gave them enjoyment [of life] for a time.

3937.verse-english: So inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Does your Lord have daughters while they have sons?

clauses-english.clause: "Does your Lord have daughters while they have sons?

3938.verse-arabic: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا الْمَلَائِكَةَ إِنَاثًا وَهُمْ شَاهِدُونَ
3938.verse-english: Or did We create the angels as females while they were witnesses?"

clauses-english.clause: Or did We create the angels as females while they were witnesses?

3939.verse-english: Unquestionably, it is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say,

clauses-english.clause: it is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say,

3940.verse-english: " Allah has begotten," and indeed, they are liars.

3941.verse-english: Has He chosen daughters over sons?

clauses-english.clause: Has He chosen daughters over sons?

3942.verse-english: What is [wrong] with you? How do you make judgement?

3943.verse-english: Then will you not be reminded?

clauses-english.clause: Then will you not be reminded?

3944.verse-english: Or do you have a clear authority?

clauses-english.clause: Or do you have a clear authority?

3945.verse-english: Then produce your scripture, if you should be truthful.

3946.verse-arabic: وَجَعَلُوا بَيْنَهُ وَبَيْنَ الْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًا ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ الْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
3946.verse-english: And they have claimed between Him and the jinn a lineage, but the jinn have already known that they [who made such claims] will be brought to [punishment].

clauses-english.clause: And they have claimed between Him and the jinn a lineage,
but the jinn have already known that they [who made such claims] will be brought to [punishment].

3947.verse-english: Exalted is Allah above what they describe,

clauses-english.clause: Exalted is God above what they describe,

3948.verse-english: Except the chosen servants of Allah [who do not share in that sin].

clauses-english.clause: Except the chosen servants of God [who do not share in that sin].

3949.verse-english: So indeed, you [disbelievers] and whatever you worship,

3950.verse-english: You cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him

clauses-english.clause: You cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him

3951.verse-english: Except he who is to [enter and] burn in the Hellfire.

clauses-english.clause: Except he who is to [enter and] burn in the Hellfire.

3952.verse-arabic: وَمَا مِنَّا إِلَّا لَهُ مَقَامٌ مَّعْلُومٌ
3952.verse-english: [The angels say], "There is not among us any except that he has a known position.

clauses-english.clause: "There is not among us any except that he has a known position.

3953.verse-english: And indeed, we are those who line up [for prayer].

clauses-english.clause: we are those who line up [for prayer].

3954.verse-english: And indeed, we are those who exalt Allah."

clauses-english.clause: we are those who exalt God.

3955.verse-english: And indeed, the disbelievers used to say,

3956.verse-arabic: لَوْ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكْرًا مِّنَ الْأَوَّلِينَ
3956.verse-english: "If we had a message from [those of] the former peoples,

clauses-arabic.clause: لَوْ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكْرًا مِّنَ الْأَوَّلِينَ

clauses-english.clause: "If we had a message from [those of] the former peoples,

3957.verse-english: We would have been the chosen servants of Allah."

clauses-english.clause: We would have been the chosen servants of God.

3958.verse-english: But they disbelieved in it, so they are going to know.

clauses-english.clause: so they are going to know.

3959.verse-english: And Our word has already preceded for Our servants, the messengers,

clauses-english.clause: And Our word has already preceded for Our servants,

3960.verse-english: [That] indeed, they would be those given victory

clauses-english.clause: they would be those given victory

3961.verse-english: And [that] indeed, Our soldiers will be those who overcome.

clauses-english.clause: Our soldiers will be those who overcome.

3962.verse-english: So, [O Muhammad], leave them for a time.

3963.verse-english: And see [what will befall] them, for they are going to see.

clauses-english.clause: for they are going to see.

3964.verse-english: Then for Our punishment are they impatient?

clauses-english.clause: Then for Our punishment are they impatient?

3965.verse-arabic: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَاءَ صَبَاحُ الْمُنذَرِينَ
3965.verse-english: But when it descends in their territory, then evil is the morning of those who were warned.

clauses-english.clause: But when it descends in their territory,
then evil is the morning of those who were warned.

3966.verse-english: And leave them for a time.

clauses-english.clause: And leave them for a time.

3967.verse-english: And see, for they are going to see.

clauses-english.clause: for they are going to see.

3968.verse-arabic: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ الْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
3968.verse-english: Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe.

3970.verse-english: And praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
